product: ELMVALE CREW NECK SWEATER BLACK LABEL
description: This midweight, easy-to-layer crew neck is crafted with double-knit Merino wool. It's paired with a Thermolite® interior in areas where you need insulation, while places that tend to overheat are crafted with a breathable open knit. Rib-knit cuffs with thumbhole construction round out this everyday piece.

Crafted in Italy by expert artisans, this classic crewneck is an instant wardrobe staple. Merino wool is a natural performance fiber, with thermoregulating properties that keep you warm when it's cool, and cool when it's warm. Articulated cuffs and hem ensure a perfect fit for this sweater, whether worn on its own or as an added layer of warmth.

This versatile midweight Merino wool hooded sweater features Thermal Mapping® to maximize element protection and breathability in transitional weather. Strategically placed wind-resistant panels at the hood, front yoke and upper back keep cold breezes from cutting through.

product: WINDBRIDGE FULL ZIP JUMPER BLACK LABEL
description: Embrace the elements wearing an exceptionally crafted sweater in durable fabric complemented by ultra-fine Merino wool. Reinforced collar, that lends an extra layer of defense against high winds and unpredictable weather. Thermal Mapping® technology under the arms and along the upper back helps to promote temperature moderation and airflow.

product: WOMEN'S LOGO SWEATER FOR ANGEL CHEN
description: Keep your core warm with this exceptionally crafted, Italian-made sweater. Ultra-fine Merino wool promotes warmth, breathability and moisture regulation when you need it most acting as the ideal base layer.

Designed for transitional weather and layering, this midweight Merino wool Hoody features Thermal Mapping® to maximize warmth and breathability. Strategically placed down-filled hood, front body and upper back with diamond-quilt detail add essential warmth where you need it most.

Designed for all day comfort and softness, the medium weight Muskoka Crewneck Sweater is an excellent layering piece for year-round warmth. Made with 100% Organic Cotton, selected by our designers for reduced water consumption and overall footprint, supporting our goal of keeping the planet cold and the people on it warm.

product: WOMEN'S HYBRIDGE QUILTED KNIT DOWN HOODY BLACK LABEL
description: When it comes to seasonal layering, our expertise in down-filled warmth is the perfect complement to an ultra-fine Merino wool sweater. This quilt-through, fitted silhouette features a lightweight, down-filled hood and a built-up collar to block chilly winds from getting in. It's finished with Thermal Mapping® technology at the centre back, sides and under the arms for natural temperature moderation and improved breathability.
